outcome: An unexplained BCI update begins assigning people new public identities, causing confusion, detentions, and widespread fear. Council factions scramble to restore trust as paranoia spreads.

events.description: Citizens report being assigned unfamiliar identities by the BCI. People are detained, locked out of homes and jobs, and subjected to random checks.
Council emergency meeting devolves into conflict over the origins of the glitch. Public confidence in BCI falls, with rumors of outside sabotage and Harmonist coverup.
Security officials round up dozens for alleged system tampering. Families protest as personal records are mismatched and missing loved ones can’t be located.
Harmonist leaders publicly acknowledge BCI failures. An uneasy calm settles as some affected regain real identities; others remain trapped and new conspiracy theories spread.
